name: Who I Am
details: I am a recent University graduate.
I have graduated with a Bachelor of Science, Computer Science from Ontario Tech University.
I am always looking for new interesting projects to work on and attempt to grow my portfolio.

name: How It Started
details: Around 2015 is when I first found an interest in Software Development.
It all generally began with my interest in wanting to create Plugins for Minecraft.
I began following Youtube Tutorials to learn everything I could about how these plugins are created and what features were possible.
This lead into Java being my very first programming language.
From there my interest grew more. I started learning more indepth features of the game like NMS and Forge modding.
Then I expanded my skills and began learning C++ for Reverse Engineering, Python, C#, and many other languages.

name: How It's Going
details: My interest in developing mods and software for games lead me down the path of Computer Science.
I decided I wanted to further my knowledge by completing a Bachelors of Science majoring in Computer Science.
I officially completed this goal as of December 2024 and I will continue to grow my skills into the future.
Now I am doing the most I can to keep my knoweldge increasing by both learning new technologies and touching up on old software.
I've also practiced managing Linux Servers (such as the one where this website is hosted) and I currently own 2 dedicated enterprise machines.

name: What I'm Looking For
details: My current goals consist of continuing my search for knoweldge by working at a company which will support growth.
I want to gain more experience in the field and find somewhere which I can put my skills to good use.
I'm looking to continue the passion I have for software development everywhere I can. Both Professional and Personal.
I love learning new things and I'm always seeking the next new project or skill that I can learn, either self taught or shown.
